name: Fertility Europe VZW
goal:
-build a strong European network among European patients and professionals in order to achieve the exchange of best practise
-promote education in the field of protection of reproductive health and a pro-active approach to family planning
-improve the situation concerning the rights of those affected by difficulties in conceiving in many areas
-allow access to fertility treatment and assisted reproduction without discrimination
-promote fertility support
-promote prevention in the areas of fertility
interests: Education and training, Public Health, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
We follow EU health and safety regulations, fertility/infertility treatments regulations, reproductive health education and prevention, laws and regulations about infertility treatments in EU countries, patients safety and quality of care.
Because patient safety is an area of national competence, we focuse on a collaborative approach and exchange of best practice action at European level.
